nodes.text: Ishnar was a Kajain'sa'Nikto female who served as muscle for Skarabda the Hutt, the chief diplomatic envoy of the Hutt Clan during the time of the High Republic Era. She was present in the city of Bilbousa on the planet Nal Hutta when a team of Jedi, consisting of the Jedi Master Obratuk and the Padawans Farzala Tarabal and Qort, arrived on the starship Vessel to negotiate with the Hutts.

Ishnar appeared in the sixth issue of the Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures comic series, written by Daniel José Older, illustrated by Harvey Tolibao and Pow Rodrix, and published by IDW Publishing on July 21, 2021.
